level.text: 2317.1 Upon discovering the loss, theft, or destruction of a registrationertificate or firearm, the holder of the certificate shall immediatelyommunicate this fact in writing or in person to the Firearms Registrationection in accordance with ยง 208 of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 7-2502.082013 Supp.)).
2317.2 Each written communication concerning a certificate shall containufficient information to identify the holder.
2317.3 The filing of an offense report or complaint of a crime with respect tohe loss, theft, or destruction of the certificate or weapon shall be deemed toe in compliance with this section.
2317.4 The holder of a destroyed, lost, or stolen certificate shall be issued auplicate certificate without charge.
2317.5 The reissued certificate shall be prominently marked as a duplicate, andhe issuance of the duplicate certificate shall automatically invalidate theost, destroyed, or stolen certificate.
